data.text:
Modern Mexican Artists

Merida, Carolos and Frances Toor

Mexico: Frances Toor Studios, 1937. Hardcover. Tan cloth boards with blue lettering on cover and black lettering on spine. 202 pp. BW illustrations. G, moderate wear to corners, edges, and spine including fraying, chipping and bumping. stain on front cover. tanning and very light foxing sporadic throughout book. Item #165855

Contents: Introduction, by Frances Toor. -- Emilio Amero. -- Julio Castellanos. -- Federico Cantú. -- Miguel Covarrubias. -- Juan Charlot. -- José Chávez Morado. -- F. Díaz de León. -- G. Fernández Ledesma. -- J. Guerrero Galván. -- Francisco Goitia. -- María Izquierdo. -- Agustín Lazo. -- Leopoldo Méndez. -- Carlos Mérida. -- Roberto Montenegro. -- Pablo O'Higgins. -- C. Orozco Romero. -- J. Clemente Orozco. -- Antonio Pujol. -- Fermín Revueltas. -- Diego Rivera. -- Antonio M. Ruiz. -- D. Alfaro Siqueiros. -- Rufino Tamayo. -- Alfredo Zalce.

OCLC: 1189551
